item.title: 4.0" IPS – 480×480 (Square)
item.description:
Use cases: Smart wall control, intercom, small HMI, instrumentation.

Highlights

  • IPS wide viewing, 600 nits typical
  • Optional optical bonding & AG cover
  • Low-power backlight for always-on UIs

Notes

  • Perfect fit for standard single 86-box front glass.
  • Ask for 720×720 variant if you need higher UI density.

item.title: 7.0" IPS Panel 1024×600 — 800nits, LVDS
item.description:
This 7.0" IPS panel offers high brightness for sunlight readability, wide viewing angles, and robust temperature tolerance for demanding environments.

Key Benefits:

  • 800nits brightness for outdoor visibility
  • LVDS interface for stable industrial integration
  • Wide operating temperature: -20°C to +70°C
  • Optional optical bonding and capacitive touch
